  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15719</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Penicillina</string>
            <string language="en">Penicilin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Penicilin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Penicilin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Penicilin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Penicilin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Penicilin</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Con questo LO gli studenti cercano di ricostruire il testo dato digitando le parole che si adattano ad esso</string>
            <string language="en">With this LO students try to build up the given text by typing in the words that fit in the text.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">invenzioni</string>
            <string language="en">u+invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">penicillina</string>
            <string language="en">penicilin</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit diesem versuchen NIEDRIGE Kursteilnehmer, den
gegebenen Text aufzubauen, indem sie in den Wörtern schreiben, die in
den Text passen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avec le ce les BAS étudiants essayent 
d'accumuler le texte donné par l'introduction au clavier les mots qui
s'adaptent dans le texte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com este os estudantes BAIXOS tentam construir 
acima do texto dado datilografando nas palavras que cabem no texto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με αυτό το LO οι σπουδαστές προσπαθούν να 
ενισχύσουν το δεδομένο κείμενο με τη δακτυλογράφηση τις λέξεις 
που ταιριάζουν στο κείμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con este los estudiantes BAJOS intentan acumular el
texto dado pulsando en las palabras que caben en el texto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">u+invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">penicilin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">u+invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">penicilin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">u+invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">penicilin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">u+invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">penicilin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">u+invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">penicilin</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">12-18</string>
            <string language="en">12-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO può essere usato per autovalutare la conoscenza delle invenzioni e di una lingua straniera. Gli studenti devono leggere il testo sulla penicillina prima del test, così da conoscere l'argomento e poi possono mettersi alla prova costruendo una storia. C'è anche un aiuto che fa in modo che non si resti bloccati durante l'esecuzione. Non è un esercizio facile</string>
            <string language="en">This LO can be used for selfasseing the knowledge about inventions, and of a foreign language. Students have to be aquanted with the text about penicilin before so they know the topic and then they can try themselves in building up a story. There is also a hint provided not to be stuck at a certain point. It's not an easy exercise.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
